transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan bolo ji sir.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji sir wo aapne kaha tha ki call mat kijiyega and mai khud aapko connect karunga nahi sir kal bhi.
Executive: Haan haan dekho wo jo feedback hai na wo caller ka hai aur caller frustrated ho chuki hai. Usne kaha sir ye feedback hai aap log change nahi karte hain. Thik hai company ka hamara ye feedback hai. Usne bhi sahi bola ki sir saal bhar se call kar hi rahi hu mai na kuch incentive bana na kuch bana. Thik hai?
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ab wo ho to chuka hai mistake ab usne kar diya to mai bhi kya kar sakta hu. Koi option to hai nahi.
Executive: Wo cheez wo cheez okay hai but sir ispe agar hum work karein maine aapse kaha tha ki bhai meri aap apni caller se baat kara dijiye. Thik hai mai aisa kuch nahi.
Customer: Mai abhi ruko usko conference pe leta hu mai abhi ruko mai usko conference leta hu wo aapko feedback dedegi pura ka pura do minute me aapko jo baat karni hai aap kar lena aapki side se. Feedback is okay I just want ki aap meeting pe connect kar paye like mam agar meeting.
Customer: Mai meeting koi connect nahi karna mere ko mera koi time waste nahi karna aap feedback dalwa do mere ko to call DND me dal do bhale se. Mere ko ek person kisi ka call nahi chahiye na koi mere ko meeting karni hai to be honest. Aapko feedback chahiye mai conference pe kar leta hu mai mere ko meri caller kharab nahi karni hai. Maine Trade India me mera caller ka number diya meri caller chhod ke chali gayi mere ko.
Executive: Sir to aap keh rahe hain agar mai.
Customer: Mere ko jeb me leke nahi ghumna caller logo ko ki mere ko naya caller mil jayega aate hi agle din hi.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi sir aap keh rahe hain agar mai mam se baat karungi to mam aapki job chhod ke chali jayengi.
Customer: Trade India ki chali gayi na wo Trade India ke person ko diya tha maine Deepak Sharma ko us bewakoof ke chhod ke.
Executive: Chali gayi.
Customer: To pata nahi aapas me inka kya discussion hua aapas me.
Executive: Are sir aisa kuch nahi hota hai.
Customer: Phone pe bane tabhi maine aapse kaha aap meeting pe rahiyega aapke samne discussion.
Executive: Mai meeting ka koi matlab hi nahi na kitna apan kitna meeting kar chuke hain aap system me dekho na aapke background me kuch meetingo ke sense nikla kya aaj tak. Mai kya karunga meeting me aapka time waste mera time waste aur mai sach bol raha hu mai khud busy chal raha hu pichle ek week se abhi busy wapas call kiya aapka dusra call aa chuka tha aapke senior ke char call aaye the parso ke din maine uthaye nahi ek ke bhi.
Executive: Senior.
Customer: Sir aapka isliye IndiaMART iski call utha raha hu mai warna koi matlab nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi wo.
Customer: Wo jo feedback ho gaya wo system me feedback aap fit kar do mai to dekho ab maine aapke satisfied dala tha ab us bewakoof ne kar diya mai kya karu maine usko bola tha usne bola sir kya fark padna jo sach hai wo sach hai.
Executive: Nahi wo cheez okay but the thing is ki agar mera discussion aapke sath hua hai to wo kuch bhi action karne se pehle aapse to discuss karenge na sir aap owner hai company ke.
Customer: Wo nahi karegi kyuki wo irritated ho chuki thi us din wo bhi daat kha chuki hai saal bhar se hum time waste kiya hai. Thik hai na kuch lead ho raha na conversion ho raha hai uska incentive banta hai based on the amount total value ke hisab se uska kuch bana nahi usko sirf salary mil rahi hai aur salary bhi kya hi matlab nikal raha hai aap samajh nahi sakte hain.
Executive: Aur kya pata sir unko incentive hota hai.
Customer: Sir kya pata mai unko incentive me help kara du to aapka bhi kaam ban jayega unka bhi kaam ban jayega is wajah se mai aapse keh rahi thi aapka time nahi chahiye matlab.
Executive: Nahi nahi unko paanch saal se.
Customer: Wo kaam kar rahi hai to wo wo na mera gyan lekin aapka gyan leti hai wo paanch saal se kaam kar rahi hai usko knowledge hai pura ka pura yaha pe jo market ke top players hai uska bhi experience hai usko to unke paas aapke aath se nau saal ka experience hai unke paas me to unko mai bhi kya gyan dunga na aap kya gyan doge wo wali baat hai na wo legi seedhi baat hai aaj aap kisi ko muh pe bolo to aate hi hath nikal jata hai sir aap hamara settlement kar dijiye free hai ab hum mai jitna bhi bata raha hu aapko ye to hai shortage.
Executive: Are sir mai itna sirf keh rahi thi kyuki mai accept karta hu is cheez se unke paas market ki knowledge hogi sir but I know ki mere paas IndiaMART ki knowledge bahut hai sir aur IndiaMART me hum kya improve kar sakte hain kahan services me gap hai bas usse mujhe work karna hai sir uske alawa mujhe koi teesra discussion mam ke sath nahi karna hai.
Customer: Wo ek kaam karo agar aapko meeting me aana hai na to aap next week ka plan karo next week me aapko bataunga date day uske according apan timing ke sath set kar lenge. Thik hai ye week to pura busy hai next week ka plan rakho aap jaise bhi rehta hai. Thik hai?
Executive: Thik hai to mai ek kaam karti hu yahan se to matlab aapka concern waise bhi close tha thik hai to baki feedback ki wajah se wapas se concern raise hua tha to ye mai yahan se close kar deti hu and aap mam se puch lijiyega mam kis bhi time pe available rehti hai us time pe hum direct connect kar lenge.
Customer: Wo available hi hai mai kar dunga meeting arrange mai khud busy nahi hu mai sath me rahunga na meeting me kya ho raha hai kya discussion mere ko malum rahega wo to free hai usko mai bhi bitha dunga meeting pe.
Executive: Okay okay acha aapka time abhi thoda wo.
Customer: Haan mai busy hu ab next week ki planning karte hain thik hai okay bye.
Executive: Okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer does not want to attend meetings.

- Customer's previous caller left after Trade India.

- Caller is frustrated with lack of incentives.



Resolution:

- Executive closed the concern from her end.

- Agreed to plan a meeting for next week.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check caller's availability for meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, meeting, caller, incentive, trade india
